Signatures

Modules

  • Config Loads the configuration files either from Kubernetes path, or local path. Note that it requires the environment variable motoEnv=[dev|prod]
  • CreateEnvironment Exposes a method for creating an envrionment Note that it requires the environment variable motoEnv=[dev|prod]
  • DeviceApi Exposes CRUD methods for registering devices Note that it requires the environment variable motoEnv=[dev|prod]
  • Environment Exposes type aliases for monad transformers, a reader monad Note that it requires the environment variable motoEnv=[dev|prod]
  • Lib
  • MongoUtils Creates a Aonnection Pool, Runs an action against the DB
  • Rest Starts the rest endpoint
